summary: This mod will localize Isimeriel collection of swords in russian...
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION
This esp will localize into Russian LOTR Weapons Collection (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5727)

Otherwise translation not only for weapons but for description too (dont think localization was to easy :))

REQUIREMENTS
1. Both types of lates mods
2. God Blessing =)
3. The paid taxes =)
4. Brain =)

INSTALLATION
1. Place Files into \"Skyrim\" directory
2. If you don`t know how to install - Switch up your brain and think about what I wrote in first tag.
3. If you cant install this after two first tags - delete this file - do not suffer yourself!

NOTE
Pack will be always update. 
Just Check version of mod and RUS-esp version!!!
And last - I didnt stole this file i make it by my own. 
!!!It is not a copypaste - this is esp file translate from LOTR ENG-esp!!!

CREDITS
Always big THANKS!!!!! For author of mods - ISILMERIEL!!!
author: DoctoR NeS
